titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: EMPLOYEE LOCAL IDENTIFIER - Description

body.p: EMPLOYEE LOCAL IDENTIFIER Â is the same as attribute EMPLOYEE LOCAL IDENTIFIER .

The Non-Medical Workforce Census requires this data item to identify an individual record. It is used in place of personal details (such as PERSON NAME and NATIONAL INSURANCE NUMBER ) to refer queries to the employing ORGANISATION .
The Electronic_Staff_Record provides this item as well as EMPLOYEE NHS IDENTIFIER . It is not duplicated and is not re-used within the system.
